name: Mora Companion Camping Knife
categories: Pocket knives and fixed blade knives
description: Cut apples, whittle sticks, or survive whatever the backcountry throws at you with this simple stainless steel knife.Textured rubber grip is comfortable in the hand while allowing for a firm grip.Stainless steel blade lasts the long haul (wipe off with fresh water before storage).Scandi ground blade is great for a variety of outdoor tasks.Flat ground spine acts as a perfect scraper for use with a fire steel.Included plastic sheath features a clip and belt loop for multiple carrying options.
